meanings.definition: One of two or more compounds with the same molecular formula but different structural arrangements.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the isomers to understand how their structures affect their properties.
meanings.sent2: Chemists often encounter isomers when analyzing different chemical compounds.
meanings.sent3: The isomers decided to have a race to see which arrangement was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The relationship between the isomers was like two identical twins with different personalities.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, the isomers danced under the microscope, showcasing their unique structures.

meanings.definition: Any of two or more compounds with the same molecular formula but different structural formulas.
meanings.sent1: The textbook explained how isomers can have distinct properties despite their similar formulas.
meanings.sent2: During the experiment, the students identified various isomers based on their structural differences.
meanings.sent3: The isomers threw a party to celebrate their diverse structural formulas.
